name: Solar System (itch) (GrubGames)
description:
Solar System model created for Game Design & Development course.

Planet rotation speeds based on real figures and proportionally accurate. 

Planet scale estimated.

Game includes

  • Mercury
  • Venus
  • Earth + Moon
  • Mars
  • Jupiter
  • Saturn
  • Neptune
  • Uranus
  • Spawning comets (every 10 seconds)

Controls

  • Orbits begin automatically.
  • Left-click planets to focus camera on them.
  • Right-click to reset view.
  • Try to click on the comets!

Credits

Brian Winn (Course Leader)

Created by Roban Colyer
